channel.title: RefactorFirst
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Spring Cloud AWS 3.0 S3 with Spring Boot and Localstack
item.description: In this article, we will look into how we can use Spring Cloud AWS S3 in a Spring Boot Application to communicate with AWS. We will run our setup with LocalStack to mock the actual AWS S3 service
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)
